amendment.description: Amendment provided for extending the time for general debate on H.R. 2127 from one hour to two and one-half hours.
amendment.purpose: An amendment which adds an additional 90 minute period of debate time at the beginning of each of the first three titles of the bill; and adds an additional one and one-half hours of general debate on the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Solomon amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
